name: ProduceMonkey
0:
”Alexa, open Produce Monkey”
”How do I store bananas”
”What do you do with broccolini”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: produce monkey
des:
Ask Produce Monkey how to store your fruits and vegetables for maximum freshness and nutrition! Just tell Alexa to open Produce Monkey, and ask away. Some sample questions are:

Where do you put rutabaga? Can you put herbs in the fridge? How do you keep apples fresh? What do I do with mushrooms?

Monkey by Ryan Spiering from the Noun Project.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
